T02D2371:9b-0: @9b * // ji ltar til la til mar khyab pa bzhin //
T02D2371:9b-1: de bzhin khams gsum 'jam dpal sku yis gang //
T02D2371:9b-2: de shes lhun grub rnal 'byor bsgom pa yis //
T02D2371:9b-3: bde chen dam pa chos kyi glu 'di long //
T02D2371:9b-4: bde gshegs kun gyi btsun mo ming med ma //
T02D2371:9b-5: sna tshogs gzugs can snying rje can de dang //
T02D2371:9b-6: lhan cig 'grogs na sdug bsngal thams cad sel //
T02D2371:9b-7: bde chen dam pa chos kyi glu 'di long //
T02D2371:9b-8: nam mkha' nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ci 'dra bar //
T02D2371:9b-9: sems kyi chos nyid de 'dra bla ma gsung //
T02D2371:9b-10: bla med don de mi shes bsgom mi nus //
T02D2371:9b-11: bde ba chen po chos kyi glu 'di long //
T02D2371:9b-12: nyi ma me shel ras bal 'dus ji bzhin //
T02D2371:9b-13: lung dang man ngag de bzhin bsten pa las //
T02D2371:9b-14: rang rig ye shes me ni 'bar bar 'gyur //
T02D2371:9b-15: bde chen dam pa chos kyi glu 'di long //
T02D2371:9b-16: glegs bam chos dang gzhan lag gnas pa'i nor //
T02D2371:9b-17: chos nor min te dgos pa'i dus na med //
T02D2371:9b-18: 'phags pa'i nor chen rang gi sems la tshongs //
T02D2371:9b-19: bde chen dam pa chos kyi glu 'di long //
T02D2371:9b-20: bde dang sdug bsngal gnas skabs thams cad du //
T02D2371:9b-21: yid bzhin nor 'dra'i de nyid byang chub sems //
T02D2371:10a-2: bde chen dam pa chos kyi glu 'di long //
